name: Accent Controls
overview:
Established in the year 1985, we “Accent Controls Pvt. Ltd.” are an eminent name involved in the business of manufacturing and supplying of an unbeatable range of Proximity Sensors.

Our Products : Under this range, we offer Cylindrical - Namur Inductive Sensors, Female Connectors-Inductive Sensors, Cylindrical - DC Inductive Sensors, Cylindrical - Value Series, Proximity Sensors-Inductive Sensors - Non Cylindrical and Inductive Sensors - Non Cylindrical.

Infrastructure: Our organization is developed a sophisticated infrastructure, which is spread in a area of 13,400 ft2. This unit is installed and equipped with highly advanced machines such as component preparation machines, computer guided placement machine, wave soldering machine and ultra-modern technology, which is essential in the process of manufacturing.

Quality Policy / Processes: We believe in offering the best quality products to our valuable customers. All our products are developed using excellent quality material and other components, which is sourced from the certified vendors of the market.

Our Team: We have a dedicate team force, which helps our organization to stand ahead in this cut throat era of competition. Our enterprise have hired a skilled & semi-skilled labours and other workers through strict procedures on the basis of their skills, talents and qualifications.
